SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Class ResCloudlet

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.ResCloudlet
Direct Known Subclasses:
HddResCloudlet, ResContainerCloudlet
public class ResCloudlet extends Object
CloudSim ResCloudlet represents a Cloudlet submitted to CloudResource for processing. This class keeps track the time for all activities in the CloudResource for a specific Cloudlet. Before a Cloudlet exits the CloudResource, it is RECOMMENDED to call this method finalizeCloudlet().

It contains a Cloudlet object along with its arrival time and the ID of the machine and the Pe (Processing Element) allocated to it. It acts as a placeholder for maintaining the amount of resource share allocated at various times for simulating any scheduling using internal events.

Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
Author:
Manzur Murshed, Rajkumar Buyya

  • Constructor Details

    • ResCloudlet

      public ResCloudlet(Cloudlet cloudlet)
      Allocates a new ResCloudlet object upon the arrival of a Cloudlet object. The arriving time is determined by
      invalid reference 
      gridsim.CloudSim#clock()
      .
      Parameters:
      cloudlet - a cloudlet object
      See Also:
      • invalid reference 
        gridsim.CloudSim#clock()
      Precondition:
      cloudlet != null
      Postcondition:
      $none

    • ResCloudlet

      public ResCloudlet(Cloudlet cloudlet, long startTime, int duration, int reservID)
      Allocates a new ResCloudlet object upon the arrival of a Cloudlet object. Use this constructor to store reserved Cloudlets, i.e. Cloudlets that done reservation before. The arriving time is determined by
      invalid reference 
      gridsim.CloudSim#clock()
      .
      Parameters:
      cloudlet - a cloudlet object
      startTime - a reservation start time. Can also be interpreted as starting time to execute this Cloudlet.
      duration - a reservation duration time. Can also be interpreted as how long to execute this Cloudlet.
      reservID - a reservation ID that owns this Cloudlet
      See Also:
      • invalid reference 
        gridsim.CloudSim#clock()
      Precondition:
      cloudlet != null, startTime > 0, duration > 0, reservID > 0
      Postcondition:
      $none

    • setExecParam

      public void setExecParam(double wallClockTime, double actualCPUTime)
      Sets this Cloudlet's execution parameters. These parameters are set by the CloudResource before departure or sending back to the original Cloudlet's owner.
      Parameters:
      wallClockTime - the time of this Cloudlet resides in a CloudResource (from arrival time until departure time).
      actualCPUTime - the total execution time of this Cloudlet in a CloudResource.
      Precondition:
      wallClockTime >= 0.0, actualCPUTime >= 0.0
      Postcondition:
      $none

    • setMachineAndPeId

      peId - Pe ID
      Precondition:
      machineID >= 0, peID >= 0
      Postcondition:
      $none

    • finalizeCloudlet

      public void finalizeCloudlet()
      Finalizes all relevant information before exiting the CloudResource entity. This method sets the final data of:
      • wall clock time, i.e. the time of this Cloudlet resides in a CloudResource (from arrival time until departure time).
      • actual CPU time, i.e. the total execution time of this Cloudlet in a CloudResource.
      • Cloudlet's finished time so far
      Precondition:
      $none
      Postcondition:
      $none

    • updateCloudletFinishedSoFar

      public void updateCloudletFinishedSoFar(long miLength)
      Updates the length of cloudlet that has already been completed.
      Parameters:
      miLength - cloudlet length in Instructions (I)
      Precondition:
      miLength >= 0.0
      Postcondition:
      $none

      public void setFinishTime(double time)

      Postcondition:
